author: Scott Polacek
title: Zach LaVine, Allie Quigley Highlight Round 1 Winners in NBA HORSE Tournament
description: Chauncey Billups, Mike Conley, Zach LaVine and  Allie Quigley  joined quite the exclusive club Sunday.      They won a nationally televised HORSE competition put on by the  NBA  ...
content:
David Sherman/Getty Images
Chauncey Billups, Mike Conley, Zach LaVine and Allie Quigley joined quite the exclusive club Sunday.
They won a nationally televised HORSE competition put on by the NBA in an effort to provide content during a worldwide pandemic t… [+3924 chars]
